text:
="preserve">Belinda Bozzoli (died 5 December 2020) was a South African author, academic, sociologist, and politician. She was Shadow Minister of Higher Education, Science and Technology from 2019 to 2020. She also was a Member of Parliament (MP) for the Democratic Alliance from 2014 to 2020.
Bozzoli died from cancer on 5 December 2020.
